Malice:
While attention was off malice, the timer continued to countdown as=
 his body slowly shifted into his newer vehicle based form.=A0 When the tim=
er reached zero, it dialed all available comm signals to deliver a message.=

"He has come, to lay waste to his enemies and lead again his loyal to vict=
ory.=A0 Join him, or perish in fire."
